mapper.sql: id, report_date, receiver_staff_id, receiver_staff_name, receiver_area, customer_counts, new_counts, new_orders, new_amounts, repeat_counts, repeat_orders, repeat_amounts, roadshow_counts, roadshow_orders, roadshow_amounts, finish_order_counts, finish_orders, finish_amounts, locked_counts, locked_orders, locked_amounts
mapper.select:
select IFNULL(sum(customer_counts),0) as total_counts, (select IFNULL(sum(customer_counts),0) from visit_report_info
and receiver_area = '1') as dl_counts, (select IFNULL(sum(customer_counts),0) from visit_report_info
and receiver_area = '0') as sy_counts from visit_report_info

select IFNULL(sum(r.locked_counts),0) as '锁定', IFNULL(sum(r.new_counts),0) as '新客户', IFNULL(sum(r.repeat_counts),0) as '重复登门', IFNULL(sum(r.roadshow_counts),0) as '说明会', IFNULL(sum(r.finish_order_counts),0) as '成单' from visit_report_info r

select count(*) from ( select e.`name` as receiver_staff_name from employee_info e left join visit_report_info v on e.id = v.receiver_staff_id
group by e.`name` ) a

select IFNULL(sum(v.finish_order_counts),0) as finish_order_counts, IFNULL(sum(v.finish_orders),0) as finish_orders, IFNULL(sum(v.finish_amounts),0) as finish_amounts, IFNULL(sum(v.locked_counts),0) as locked_counts, IFNULL(sum(v.locked_orders),0) as locked_orders, IFNULL(sum(v.locked_amounts),0) as locked_amounts from visit_report_info v
